### Terminal

A terminal program allows you to interact with many different programs using a command line interface.
Instead of using graphical elements like in a graphical user interface, you type in commands descibing what program you want to use and how you want to use it.

::: {.panel-tabset group="os"}
## Windows

The terminal app *Terminal* comes preinstalled with Windows.
Activate the Windows Start menu, start typing "terminal" and select the Terminal app by pressing {{< kbd Enter >}}.

## macOS

The terminal app *Terminal* comes preinstalled with macOS.
Activate Spotlight with {{< kbd Command-Space >}}, start typing "terminal" and select the Terminal app by pressing {{< kbd Enter >}}.
:::

You will need to open the terminal several times in these instructions to install other programs.
